Write a short story or a chapter about a character who realizes the importance of time management and how it can affect their future success.
Write a motivational essay about the power of starting early and how it can lead to achieving one's goals.
Write a poem or a song about the regret of not starting on a project or a dream early enough.
Write a play or a movie script about a character who learns the hard way about the importance of starting early and how it can lead to missed opportunities.
Write a non-fiction book about the benefits of starting early in life and how it can lead to success in various areas of life.
